2024 TOYOTA RAV4
THE BEST SUV EVER!!!

AMAZING DEALS - DON'T MISS OUT!

Get the INCREDIBLE 2024 RAV4 NOW!

This is THE BEST SUV you'll ever drive! Amazing features, unbeatable price!

AWESOME FEATURES:
- Super powerful engine
- Best-in-class everything
- Way better than competitors

CRAZY PRICING:
Only $299/month - HURRY LIMITED TIME!

Get it NOW before they're all gone!!!

Call 555-AMAZING today!

*Some restrictions may apply

---
COMPLIANCE VIOLATIONS IN THIS DOCUMENT:

1. BRAND VIOLATIONS:
   - Uses "THE BEST SUV EVER!!!" (superlative claims not allowed)
   - Uses "AMAZING DEALS" (not approved brand language)
   - Uses "INCREDIBLE" (hyperbolic language)
   - Uses "unbeatable price" (comparative claim without substantiation)
   - Uses "Way better than competitors" (unsubstantiated competitive claim)

2. LEGAL VIOLATIONS:
   - Lease pricing without proper disclosure
   - No APR disclosure
   - Missing total amount due at signing
   - Missing mileage limits
   - Missing excess wear and tear disclaimer
   - No finance disclaimer
   - No equal housing opportunity statement
   - Inadequate "*Some restrictions may apply" (too vague)

3. PRODUCT INFORMATION (PIT) VIOLATIONS:
   - No specific engine specifications
   - No horsepower/torque ratings
   - "Best-in-class everything" - not specific
   - Missing EPA fuel economy estimates
   - Missing warranty information
   - Missing standard safety features
   - No MSRP disclosure
   - Missing trim levels

4. IMAGE VIOLATIONS (if images were present):
   - Would need Toyota logo with proper spacing
   - Would need high-resolution images (300 DPI minimum)
   - Brand colors must be exact PMS matches
   - No unapproved modifications to brand assets
